# ReviewAI - AI Review Response Generator
> Built for busy local business owners. Get professional, human-like responses to customer reviews in seconds.

## Product Overview
ReviewAI is a simple, affordable tool designed for small local businesses (cafes, salons, retail) to manage their online reputation. It generates 3 distinct AI response variations (Professional, Friendly, Witty, Empathetic) for any customer review.

## Core Features
1. **AI Response Generator**: Paste a review -> Get 3 varied responses instantly.
2. **Tone Customization**: Choose the voice that fits your brand (Professional, Friendly, Empathetic, Witty).
3. **Google Business Integration**: Connect your Google Business Profile to sync and reply directly from the dashboard.
4. **Multi-Language Support**: (Coming Soon) Generate responses in Hindi and English.
